tasks.title: Identify and Verify Most Advanced Orchestration-Tools Branch
tasks.description: Determine which orchestration-tools branch contains the most advanced and functional launch code, and verify its functionality before any alignment work begins
tasks.details:
1. List all orchestration-tools branches and compare their commit history
2. Identify which branch has the most advanced launch.py functionality
3. Test launch.py functionality on that branch to verify it works correctly
4. Document the selected branch as the primary orchestration branch for prioritized alignment
5. Verify agent integration and context control functionality works properly
tasks.testStrategy: Run `python launch.py --system-info` on the selected orchestration branch and confirm it executes without errors, provides system information, and all orchestration features work correctly

subtasks.title: List and Compare All Orchestration Tools Branches
subtasks.description: Identify all orchestration-tools branches and evaluate their current state
subtasks.details: Use git commands to list all orchestration-tools branches and examine their commit history to identify the most recent/advanced one

subtasks.title: Test Launch Functionality on Each Orchestration Branch
subtasks.description: Verify launch.py works correctly on each orchestration branch
subtasks.details: Check out each orchestration branch and run basic launch functionality to identify which has working code

subtasks.title: Document Selected Branch for Prioritized Alignment
subtasks.description: Create documentation identifying the chosen orchestration branch for priority alignment
subtasks.details: Create documentation specifying which orchestration branch to align first and why it was selected

tasks.title: Fix Critical Migration Import Issues (backend â†’ src)
tasks.description: Address the critical import statement issues where files were moved from backend/ to src/backend/ but imports weren't updated
tasks.details:
1. Identify all Python files in src/backend that still have imports like 'from backend.python_nlp...'
2. Update import statements to use correct paths 'from src.backend.python_nlp...'
3. Verify all imports work correctly after changes
4. Test application functionality after import fixes
5. Update any configuration files that reference old paths

This is critical to prevent ImportError crashes after alignment operations.
tasks.testStrategy: After import updates, run the application to ensure all modules load correctly without ImportError exceptions. Run existing test suites to verify imports work correctly.

subtasks.title: Identify All Files with Incorrect Import Statements
subtasks.description: Find all Python files in src/backend that reference 'from backend.' imports
subtasks.details: Use grep to find all files with 'from backend' or 'import backend' statements that need updating

subtasks.title: Update Import Statements to Use src/ Prefix
subtasks.description: Change all 'from backend...' to 'from src.backend...' in identified files
subtasks.details: Systematically update each import statement to use the correct src.backend path

subtasks.title: Verify All Imports Work Correctly After Changes
subtasks.description: Test that the application loads all modules correctly after import updates
subtasks.details: Run the application and existing tests to ensure no ImportError exceptions occur

tasks.title: Resolve Similar Named Branch Confusion
tasks.description: Address branch confusion between similar named branches like notmuch-tagging variants to prevent merge conflicts
tasks.details:
1. Identify all branches with similar names but potentially different content
2. Determine which version of each similar branch should be preserved
3. Plan merge or consolidation strategy for similar branches
4. Update documentation to reflect branch consolidation decisions

Specific focus on: align-feature-notmuch-tagging-1, align-feature-notmuch-tagging-1-v2, feature-notmuch-tagging-1
tasks.testStrategy: After branch resolution, verify that there are no conflicting branches with similar functionality. Confirm that feature development is consolidated to appropriate branches.

subtasks.title: Identify All Similar Named Branches
subtasks.description: Find all branches with similar names that may have conflicting functionality
subtasks.details: Use git commands to identify branches with similar naming patterns that may have divergent content

subtasks.title: Analyze Content Differences Between Similar Branches
subtasks.description: Compare the actual content of similar named branches to identify differences
subtasks.details: Use git diff to compare content between branches with similar names to identify actual differences

subtasks.title: Plan Consolidation Strategy for Similar Branches
subtasks.description: Determine which branches to keep, merge, or archive to reduce confusion
subtasks.details: Create a strategy for consolidating similar branches to prevent future conflicts during alignment

metadata.description: Prerequisite tasks for core alignment that address critical issues found in branch analysis
